text: Feldspar is a group of rock-forming minerals including *Alkali feldspar *Alkali feldspar granite *Potassium feldspar Feldspar may also refer to * Community in Tay Valley, Ontario, Canada *USS Feldspar (IX-159), a concrete barge *Craig Feldspar, a character in the American television comedy series Malcolm in the Middle
title: Feldspar (disambiguation)
